xwikidoc.name: FPatientSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="ClinicalInformationCode.PatientSheetUI" /}}
{{velocity}} #if ("$!{class}" != '') = $doc.name = (% class="twothird-width clear patient-info chapter" %)((( == Patient Information == #__display2Col('p_id' '' 'mandatory' '') #__display2Col('gender' 'Sex:' 'mandatory' 'group-title') ## Age of onset zone: #if ($context.action == 'edit') (% class="fieldset onset controlled-group" %)((( (% class="half-width side controller" %)((( #__label('age_of_onset_years' "section group-title" 'Onset:') (% style="margin: 0 1em" %)(%%)## $doc.display('congenital')## #__label('congenital' '' 'Congenital') ## (% class="controlled" style="margin: 0 1em" %)or(%%) #__label('age_of_onset_years' 'section controlled' 'Specify age:') )))## or specify age (% class="half-width controlled" %)((( (% class="half-width age_of_onset_years" %)((( #__label('age_of_onset_years' 'hint') #__display('age_of_onset_years') )))## years (% class="half-width age_of_onset_months" %)((( #__label('age_of_onset_months' 'hint') #__display('age_of_onset_months') )))## months )))## years and months )))## fieldset: age of onset zone #else (% class="fieldset onset" %)((( (% class="half-width" %)((( #__label('onset' 'section') ))) (% class="half-width" %)((( #__display('onset') ))) ))) #end (% class="clear" %)((())) #if ($context.action == 'edit' || ($doc.display('relative') != '' && $doc.display('relative_of') != '')) ###if ($false) (% class="fieldset family_study" %)((( (% class="half-width relative side" %)((( #__label('' 'section' 'Family study:') ## $doc.display('relative') ## #__label('relative_of' 'section' 'of')## ))) (% class="half-width relative_of" %)((( #__label('relative_of' 'hint' 'Patient (MRN)') #__display('relative_of') ))) )))##fieldset (% class="clear" %)((())) #end #__displayIfNotEmpty2Col('omim_id' '' '' '') )))##chapter
(% class="clear" %)((()))
(% class="clear clinical-info phenotype-info chapter mandatory" %)((( #__qsBox("$!{class.name}_$!{obj.number}_phenotype") (% class="twothird-width" %)((( (% class="group-title" %) == $!{class.get('phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('phenotype')## ))) (% class="twothird-width" %)((( #__displayIfNotEmpty('comments') ))) )))##chapter
(% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info prenatal_phenotype-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('prenatal_phenotype').prettyName} == $doc.display('prenatal_phenotype') )))##chapter
(% class="twothird-width clear clinical-info family_history-info chapter" %)((( == $!{class.get('family_history').prettyName} == $doc.display('family_history') #__displayIfNotEmpty('family_comments') )))##chapter
#if ($config && "$!{config.getProperty('variants').value}" == '1') (% class="clear variant-info chapter" %)((( == Variants == #__variant_displayVariants() )))##chapter #end
#end## class exists {{/velocity}}
